values: The joys and sorrows of church planting in Kenya, with Pastor Kip’ Chelashaw

Pastor Jeffery talks with Pastor Kip’ Chelashaw, one of the missionaries we support as a church at All Saints, about his work as a church planter in Kenya. We discuss the shape of Kip’s ministry in Nairobi, the state of the church more broadly, the realities of spiritual warfare in a context rife with ancestor-veneration and […]
